quizDescription.text:
Note: Write your correct options with comma and space separated
  • Ex1: a, b
  • Ex2: c
  • Ex3: a, c, d
  • Correct Options must me in ascending order
  • Some answers contains true or false, please write true or false in blank.

questionText.text:
Which of the following is an aggregate function?
a. Min
b. Create
c. except
d. Select
e. Absolute

Which of the following is not true about SQL statements
a. SQL statements are not case sensitive.
b. SQL statements can be written on one or more lines.
c. Keywords cannot be split across lines
d. Clauses must be written on separate lines.

Which of the following Syntaxes are wrong.
a. SELECT column-list FROM table_name [ORDER BY column1, column2, .. columnN] [WHERE condition] [ASC | DESC];
b. SELECT column-list FROM table_name [WHERE condition] [ORDER BY column1 [ASC | DESC], column2 [ASC | DESC], .. columnN[ASC | DESC]] ;
d. SELECT column-list FROM table_name [WHERE condition] [ASC | DESC] [ORDER BY column1, column2, .. columnN];
Natural join requires the keywords using (or) on   (true/false)

Full outer join is Union of:
a. Center join
b. left outer join
c. right outer join
d. All the above
